title: Chiral bisphosphine Ph-BPE ligand: a rising star in asymmetric synthesis
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00028A, Review Article
Peifeng Mei, Zibin Ma, Yu Chen, Yue Wu, Wei Hao, Qing-Hua Fan, Wen-Xiong Zhang
The review summarizes the increasing applications of the chiral bisphosphine ligand Ph-BPE in catalytic asymmetric reactions in the past twenty years.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
